content: the coastline tank top is a light and breezy tank top it features a universally-flattering scoop neck and a sleek ribbed armhole that seamlessly blends into the side ribbing an optional split-hem gives it an extra summery look this pattern includes 9 sizes ranging from a finished bust measurement of 30-54 **video tutorial** if you re nervous you won t understand the pattern the tutorial videos will hold your hand through the whole knitting process at a little over 90 minutes these comprehensive video tutorials cover the whole knitting process from beginning to end watch the free videos here part 1 1 and part 2 2 **sizing ** this tank is designed to have 2-3 of positive ease finished bust measurements 76 80 86 5 90 96 107 5 117 126 5 138 cm / 30 31 5 34 35 5 37 75 42 25 46 49 75 54 25 inches **materials ** yarn 420 430 460 480 510 580 630 680 750 metres 460 470 510 530 560 630 685 750 820 yards sandnes garn line 50g = 110 m in color 9564 matcha the pink tank top is knit in 4636 shocking pink needles * one us 6 4 mm 80 cm 32 inch circular needle * one us 4 3 5 mm 40 or 60 cm 16 or 24 inch circular needle for neckband * one us 4 3 5 mm 80 cm 32 inch circular needle for hem notions * stitch markers including removable markers * cable needle * scrap yarn * tape measure * scissors gauge 20 sts and 31 row = 10 cm / 4 inches in stockinette stitch in the round using larger needles difficulty this pattern is for experienced knitters 1 https //youtu be/wayndpgntjg 2 https //youtu be/bi-0b_dx8s8
